description: If ever a T-shirt summed up what Mountain Hardwear's all about, the Wicked Tech™ Short Sleeve serves up adventure-ready performance with a sustainable construction. Made with 100% recycled polyester that's durable and easy on the environment, this lightweight, moisture-wicking shirt dries in a flash and protects against harmful rays thanks to its UPF 50 fabric.
name: Mountain Hardwear Wicked Tech SS - Mens

specs.value: Recycled Solid Poly Tech T - 100% Recycled Polyester
